sourcesContent:
import logo from './logo.svg';
import './App.css';

import React, { useState } from "react";
import { CompactPicker } from "react-color";
import random from "lodash/random";
import { Button, HStack, VStack, SimpleGrid, Box, Card, CardBody, Heading, Stack, StackDivider, CardHeader, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react";

const App = () => {
  const [color, setColor] = useState("#FAD02C");
  const [bgColor, setBgColor] = useState("#68BBE3");
  const [eyeColor, setEyeColor] = useState("#000000");
  const [beakColor, setBeakColor] = useState("#E7625F");
  const colours = require("nice-color-palettes");

  const handleRandomize = () => {
    const randomColours = colours[random(0, colours.length - 1)];
    setColor(randomColours[0]);
    setBgColor(randomColours[1]);
    setEyeColor(randomColours[2]);
    setBeakColor(randomColours[3]);
  };

    return (
      <SimpleGrid spacing={4} p={4}>
        <Card p={4}>
          <Heading size="md">Pixel Duck Maker</Heading>
        </Card>
        <Card p={4}>
          <HStack spacing={4}>
            <Box>
              <svg id="duck" viewBox="0 0 128 128" width="128" height="128">
                <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="44" width="16" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="40" y="48" width="24" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="40" y="52" width="24" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="48" y="52" width="4" height="4" fill={eyeColor} />
                <rect x="36" y="56" width="4" height="4" fill={beakColor} />
                <rect x="32" y="60" width="12" height="4" fill={beakColor} />
                <rect x="40" y="56" width="24" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="60" width="20" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="48" y="64" width="32" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="68" width="52" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="72" width="48" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="76" width="44" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="80" width="44" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="48" y="84" width="40" height="4" fill={color} />
                <rect x="52" y="88" width="32" height="4" fill={color} />
              </svg>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <svg id="duck" viewBox="0 0 128 128" width="128" height="128">
                <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill={color} />
                <rect x="44" y="44" width="16" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="40" y="48" width="24" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="40" y="52" width="24" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="48" y="52" width="4" height="4" fill={eyeColor} />
                <rect x="36" y="56" width="4" height="4" fill={beakColor} />
                <rect x="32" y="60" width="12" height="4" fill={beakColor} />
                <rect x="40" y="56" width="24" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="60" width="20" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="48" y="64" width="32" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="68" width="52" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="72" width="48" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="76" width="44" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="44" y="80" width="44" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="48" y="84" width="40" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
                <rect x="52" y="88" width="32" height="4" fill={bgColor} />
              </svg>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <HStack>
                <Button onClick={handleRandomize}>Randomize</Button>
              </HStack>
            </Box>
          </HStack>
        </Card>
        <Card>
          <CardBody>
            <Stack divider={<StackDivider />} spacing="4">
              <Box>
                <Heading mb={4} size="xs">Body Colour</Heading>
                <CompactPicker
                  width="100%"
                  color={color}
                  onChange={(color) => setColor(color.hex)}
                />
              </Box>
              <Box>
                <Heading mb={4} size="xs">Beak Colour</Heading>
                <CompactPicker
                  width="100%"
                  color={beakColor}
                  onChange={(beakColor) => setBeakColor(beakColor.hex)}
                />
              </Box>
              <Box>
                <Heading mb={4} size="xs">Eye Colour</Heading>
                <CompactPicker
                  width="100%"
                  color={eyeColor}
                  onChange={(eyeColor) => setEyeColor(eyeColor.hex)}
                />
              </Box>
              <Box>
                <Heading mb={4} size="xs">Background Colour</Heading>
                <CompactPicker
                  width="100%"
                  color={bgColor}
                  onChange={(bgColor) => setBgColor(bgColor.hex)}
                />
              </Box>
            </Stack>
          </CardBody>
        </Card>
      </SimpleGrid>
    );
};

export default App;
